faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our courses, admissions process, and technical support.

courses.title: Courses
courses.a1: We cover a wide range of popular and in‑demand languages including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and SQL. Our curriculum is constantly updated to reflect industry trends.
courses.a2: Absolutely! We have courses designed for all levels, from complete beginners with no prior coding experience to advanced developers looking to specialize in new technologies.

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.q1: What are the prerequisites for enrolling?
admissions.a1: For most of our introductory courses, the only prerequisite is a strong desire to learn. Advanced courses list specific prerequisites on the course page.
admissions.q2: Is there a deadline to apply?
admissions.a2: Most courses have rolling admissions and can be started anytime. Some cohort-based programs have deadlines which are clearly communicated on their pages.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.q1: What kind of technical support is available?
technical.a1: We provide 24/7 technical support via our portal, instructor office hours, community forums, and optional one‑to‑one mentorship depending on plan.
technical.q2: What are the system requirements for the courses?
technical.a2: A computer with a reliable internet connection and a modern browser. Any specific tools are generally free and described in course setup guides.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Our team is here to help. Get in touch with us for any further inquiries.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.readCarefully: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to EduPlatform! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms. Our services provide access to a comprehensive suite of courses in IT, Computer Science, and Web Development.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.content: To access most features of the platform, you must register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information and to keep this information up to date.

content.title: 3. Content and Conduct
content.content: All content provided on EduPlatform, including courses, text, and videos, is the property of EduPlatform or its content suppliers. You may not distribute, modify, or reproduce any content without our prior written permission. You agree to use the platform for lawful purposes only and not to engage in any conduct that is disruptive or harmful to others.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Refunds
payments.content: Certain services are available for a fee. You agree to pay all applicable fees for the courses you purchase. All fees are non-refundable, except as required by law or as explicitly stated in our Refund Policy. We may use third-party payment processors to handle payments.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided on an AS IS and AS AVAILABLE basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, as to the operation of our services, or the information, content, or materials included therein. You expressly agree that your use of the service is at your sole risk.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall EduPlatform, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.

hero.title: Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers
hero.description: Our mission is to provide accessible and high-quality tech education to help you achieve your career goals. Learn from the best and get certified in the most sought-after technologies in IT, Computer Science, and Web Development.

section1.title: Learn from industry experts
section1.description: Our instructors are seasoned professionals with years of real-world experience, bringing practical insights and knowledge to every course. They're passionate about teaching and dedicated to your success.
section1.imageAlt: A diverse group of students collaborating in a modern classroom setting.

section2.title: Get certified in the most in-demand technologies
section2.description: Our certifications are recognized by top companies and cover the latest technologies, giving you a competitive edge in the job market. From full-stack development to data science, we have you covered.
section2.imageAlt: A person proudly holding a certificate of completion.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.description: Sign up today and take the first step towards a rewarding career in tech.
